channel.title: Plan on Bible Research
channel.description: Recent content in Plan on Bible Research

item.title: Prayer Plan
item.description: I use it as a system for guiding my prayer life and I hope you find it helpful. Feel free to tweak and modify it as you see fit. Basics There are two basic parts of this system: Prayer items Bible passages The idea is that you split up your prayer items over a week and will have a specific Bible passage to guide your prayer each week.
